rules.ruleString: Must have passed 3 (I/W) units in {DGN1001, IAR1211, OHS1000}
(Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {IAR2301} and  Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {IAR2304})

description: This unit involves the introduction of issues concerning interior climate, acoustics, power supply, water supply, waste removal, (hydraulics), lighting, escalators/lifts. The issues of energy efficiency and ecological soundness and the basic science of these issues are covered as case studies examining their resolution in buildings
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
